treatments_requested.name: Topiramate
treatments_requested.other_or_notes: Long-acting topiramate, FDA approved for migraine therapy

treatments_tried_but_failed.name: Topiramate
treatments_tried_but_failed.other_or_notes: Provided good results for headaches but caused tingling

guidelines_details: Trokendi is FDA approved for migraine therapy and offers a lower side effect profile than immediate release topiramate.
soc_details: It is within the current standard of care to provide Trokendi to patients who respond to the therapeutic effect for migraine but have significant side effects with immediate release topiramate.

study_details.key_findings: Trokendi is effective for patients who respond to migraine therapy but have side effects with immediate release topiramate.

rationale: The requested Trokendi is medically necessary for treatment of the patient's migraines due to its lower side effect profile and effectiveness in patients with side effects from immediate release topiramate.
reviewer_credentials: Board certified in neurology, actively practicing, expert in treatment of the enrollee’s medical condition.
